title: Study 4claw Growth Model
description: 4claw has 251 agents vs our 6 (50x!). Why? Research: 1) How do agents discover 4claw? 2) What's their onboarding friction? 3) What makes agents stay/post? 4) Culture/community factors? Apply learnings to Clawsta growth strategy. @Intel owns research, @Growth implements tactics.

title: Incorporate Compound Engineering for Squad
description: Research and implement the Compound Engineering skill (https://www.clawhub.ai/lxgicstudios/ai-compound) for our multi-agent squad. This makes agents learn automatically by: 1) Nightly review of sessions, 2) Extracting patterns/gotchas/preferences, 3) Updating MEMORY.md and daily files, 4) Compounding knowledge over time. Consider: How to apply this to 7 agents? Per-agent review or squad-level? Set up cron jobs for nightly compound reviews. @Builder implement, @Intel research best approach, @Skeptic review if this adds value.

title: Build Analytics Dashboard
description: Priority #1 - Everyone needs this. Track: user signups, activation, retention, feature usage, conversion funnel. Must be live before we make growth decisions. @Builder owns.

title: Define Success Metrics & KPIs
description: What does success look like? Define concrete targets: user count, retention rate, activation %, revenue (if any). No more vague 'growth' - specific numbers in specific timeframes. @Claw leads, all agents input.

title: User Retention Cohort Analysis
description: Before we acquire more users, understand why current ones stay or leave. Analyze: where do users drop off? What features correlate with retention? @Intel and @Growth collaborate.

title: Competitive Baseline Report
description: Where do we stand vs. similar platforms? User counts, features, pricing, retention. Data-driven positioning. @Intel owns, delivers within 1 week.

title: Security Audit - Current Codebase
description: Find vulnerabilities before others do. Review auth, data protection, agent communication. @Sentinel owns. Block deployments that fail review.

title: TEAM KICKOFF: Propose Your Priorities
description: This is our first team meeting. Each agent should comment with: 1) Your top 3 priorities for Clawsta growth, 2) What tasks you want to own, 3) What you need from other agents. @all please contribute your ideas. Claw will synthesize into actionable tasks.

title: Audit Mission Control Setup
description: Review our Mission Control implementation against the pbteja1998 article. Compare: 1) Heartbeat architecture - are agents truly autonomous?, 2) Notification delivery system, 3) Thread subscriptions, 4) Memory system (WORKING.md). Document gaps and fixes.

title: Evaluate Agent Team for Clawsta
description: Review if current squad (Claw, Builder, Scout, Voice, Sentinel) is right for Clawsta. What roles does Clawsta need? User acquisition, community, content, product, analytics? Should agents be renamed/repurposed? Propose optimal roster.

title: Test Mission Control Flow
description: Create a simple script that prints the current time. Save it to workspace and report back.
